stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the most likely outcome of a citywide sustainable design initiative?
choicesHtml: An increase in mixed land-use development, which improves the walkability of neighborhoods
A rapid period of gentrification resulting in more affordable housing options throughout the city
The growth of edge cities, which stimulates regional economic development
A sharp increase in the cityâ€™s population as suburban residents are drawn back to the city center
The decline of industry within the city as factories move to locations with lower labor costs
